HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Cijena dostave ovisi o težini pošiljke i odredištu. Besplatna dostava za narudžbe iznad 50 EUR (ne uključuje ulaznice i plaćanje pouzećem).
HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Besplatna dostava za narudžbe iznad 50 EUR (ne uključuje ulaznice i plaćanje pouzećem)
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava se vrši unutar pet (5) radnih dana, osim za pošiljke koje se dostavljaju u mjesta bez pravodobne i redovite prometne veze.

locations: Rockmark, Ulica Hrvatske bratske zajednice 4, 10000 Zagreb

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The primary delivery methods are home delivery across Croatia and in-store pickup at their Zagreb location. There are no options for parcel shops or lockers.
PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled by unspecified 'contractual partners'.
PRICING: Home delivery cost is based on weight and destination, with free shipping for orders over €50 (this excludes tickets and cash on delivery payments). In-store pickup is free. Cash on delivery (COD) incurs a €1 surcharge.
DELIVERY TIMES & RESTRICTIONS: Standard home delivery takes up to 5 working days. Deliveries are not made on weekends or holidays. For remote locations and islands, delivery may take longer. Tickets for events occurring within 7 days cannot be delivered and must be picked up in-store. Alcohol is not shipped outside of Croatia.
NOTABLE FEATURES: In-store pickup is available on Saturdays. The free shipping threshold is a clear €50.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is available within the 'Uvjeti prodaje' (Terms of Sale) page. While comprehensive, it is mixed with other legal terms, which can make it difficult for users to quickly find delivery-specific details. The absence of specific courier names is a drawback. A separate, dedicated shipping information page would significantly improve user experience.
